Package lubiku.castleQuest.Controller.Handlers

Class CollisionHandler

java.lang.Object
lubiku.castleQuest.Controller.Handlers.CollisionHandler
public class CollisionHandler extends Object

CollisionHandler

Handles collisions between entities, objects, and tiles in the game.

  • Method Details

    • checkMonster

      public int checkMonster(Entity entity)

      checkMonster

      Checks for collision between an entity and monsters (NPC or hero).
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity to check collision for.
      Returns:
      The index of the monster if collision occurs, otherwise 999.

    • checkMonsterIntersection

      public boolean checkMonsterIntersection(Rectangle entitySolidArea, int index)

      checkMonsterIntersection

      Checks if the entity's solid area intersects with a monster's solid area.
      Parameters:
      entitySolidArea - The entity's solid area.
      index - The index of the monster.
      Returns:
      True if the collision occurs, false otherwise.

    • resetMonsterValues

      public void resetMonsterValues(Entity entity, int index)

      resetMonsterValues

      Resets the values of a monster entity and its corresponding solid area. Sets the solid area's position to its default position.
      Parameters:
      entity - The monster entity to reset.
      index - The index of the monster entity in the monster manager.

    • getMonsterXPos

      public int getMonsterXPos(int index)

      getMonsterXPos

      Retrieves the X position of a monster entity based on its index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the monster entity in the monster manager.
      Returns:
      The X position of the monster entity.

    • getMonsterYPos

      public int getMonsterYPos(int index)

      getMonsterYPos

      Retrieves the Y position of a monster entity based on its index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the monster entity in the monster manager.
      Returns:
      The Y position of the monster entity.

    • getMonsterDefaultSolidAreaX

      public int getMonsterDefaultSolidAreaX(int index)

      getMonsterDefaultSolidAreaY

      Retrieves the default X position of the solid area of a monster entity based on its index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the monster entity in the monster manager.
      Returns:
      The default X position of the solid area.

    • getMonsterDefaultSolidAreaY

      public int getMonsterDefaultSolidAreaY(int index)

      getMonsterDefaultSolidAreaY

      Retrieves the default Y position of the solid area of a monster entity based on its index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the monster entity in the monster manager.
      Returns:
      The default Y position of the solid area.

    • checkEntity

      public boolean checkEntity(Entity entity, Entity target)

      checkEntity

      Checks for contact between an entity and its target entity. Sets the solid area positions for both entities based on their default positions. Checks for intersection between the entity's solid area and the target entity's solid area based on the direction of the entity. Resets the values of the entity and the target entity.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity to check contact for.
      target - The target entity to check contact with.
      Returns:
      True if there is contact, false otherwise.

    • checkEntityIntersection

      public boolean checkEntityIntersection(Rectangle entitySolidArea, Rectangle targetSolidArea)

      checkEntityIntersection

      Checks if there is any intersection between the solid areas of two entities.
      Parameters:
      entitySolidArea - The solid area of the entity.
      targetSolidArea - The solid area of the target entity.
      Returns:
      True if there is an intersection, false otherwise.

    • resetEntityValues

      public void resetEntityValues(Entity entity, Entity target)

      resetEntityValues

      Resets the values of an entity and its target entity. Resets the solid area positions of both entities.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity to reset.
      target - The target entity to reset.

    • checkObject

      public int checkObject(Entity entity, boolean isHero)

      checkObject

      Checks for collision between an entity and objects in the game world. Returns the index of the collided object if the entity is a hero, otherwise returns a default value of 999.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity to check collision for.
      isHero - True if the entity is a hero, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      The index of the collided object if the entity is a hero, or 999 if it is not.

    • checkObjectIntersection

      public boolean checkObjectIntersection(Rectangle entitySolidArea, int index)

      checkObjectIntersection

      Checks if there is any intersection between the solid area of an entity and an object at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      entitySolidArea - The solid area of the entity.
      index - The index of the object to check intersection with.
      Returns:
      True if there is an intersection, false otherwise.

    • checkObjectCollision

      public boolean checkObjectCollision(int index)

      checkObjectCollision

      Checks if there is a collision with an object at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the object to check collision with.
      Returns:
      True if there is a collision, false otherwise.

    • resetObjectValues

      public void resetObjectValues(Entity entity, int index)

      resetObjectValues

      Resets the values of an entity and an object at the specified index. Resets the entity's values and restores the object's solid area position to its default position.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity to reset.
      index - The index of the object to reset.

    • getObjectXPos

      public int getObjectXPos(int index)

      getObjectXPos

      Returns the X position of the object at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the object.
      Returns:
      The X position of the object.

      The default X position of the object's solid area.

    • checkTile

      public void checkTile(Entity entity)

      checkTile

      Checks for collision between the entity and tiles in the game world.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity to check tile collision for.

    • handleUpTileCollision

      private void handleUpTileCollision(Entity entity, int[][] mapBlockNumbers, int entityTopWorldY, int entityLeftCol, int entityRightCol)

      handleUpTileCollision

      Handles the tile collision when the entity is moving up.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity involved in the collision.
      mapBlockNumbers - The 2D array representing the tile map.
      entityTopWorldY - The top Y-coordinate of the entity in the world.
      entityLeftCol - The left column index of the entity in the tile map.
      entityRightCol - The right column index of the entity in the tile map.

    • handleDownTileCollision

      private void handleDownTileCollision(Entity entity, int[][] mapBlockNumbers, int entityBottomWorldY, int entityLeftCol, int entityRightCol)

      handleDownTileCollision

      Handles the tile collision when the entity is moving up.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity involved in the collision.
      mapBlockNumbers - The 2D array representing the tile map.
      entityBottomWorldY - The bottom Y-coordinate of the entity in the world.
      entityLeftCol - The left column index of the entity in the tile map.
      entityRightCol - The right column index of the entity in the tile map.

    • handleLeftTileCollision

      private void handleLeftTileCollision(Entity entity, int[][] mapBlockNumbers, int entityLeftWorldX, int entityTopRow, int entityBottomRow)

      handleLeftTileCollision

      Handles the tile collision when the entity is moving up.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity involved in the collision.
      mapBlockNumbers - The 2D array representing the tile map.
      entityLeftWorldX - The left X-coordinate of the entity in the world.
      entityTopRow - The top row index of the entity in the tile map.
      entityBottomRow - The bottom row index of the entity in the tile map.

    • handleRightTileCollision

      private void handleRightTileCollision(Entity entity, int[][] mapBlockNumbers, int entityRightWorldX, int entityTopRow, int entityBottomRow)

      handleRightTileCollision

      Handles the tile collision when the entity is moving up.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity involved in the collision.
      mapBlockNumbers - The 2D array representing the tile map.
      entityRightWorldX - The right X-coordinate of the entity in the world.
      entityTopRow - The top row index of the entity in the tile map.
      entityBottomRow - The bottom row index of the entity in the tile map.

    • checkCollision

      private void checkCollision(Entity entity, int blockOne, int blockTwo)

      checkCollision

      Checks the collision between the entity and the specified tiles.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity involved in the collision.
      blockOne - The first block index to check collision with.
      blockTwo - The second block index to check collision with.
